snippet.title: Residual (Announcement Trailer)
snippet.description:
Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1290780/Residual/

#gamedeveloper #indiedev #gaming #programming
__

I'm Pascal a Dutch independent game developer since 2004 known as Orangepixel. I created various games including the Gunslugs series, Heroes of Loot series, Space Grunts series, Stardash and the Meganoid series released on PC, mobile and various consoles. 

MERCH:https://shop.orangepixel.net/
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/orangepixel
__
If you want exclusive sketches and behind the scenes info delivered to your mail box, sign-up here:
http://www.orangepixel.net/sign-up/

Or be a PATRON: http://patreon.com/orangepixel
__

COME SAY HI! on SOCIAL MEDIA:

➡️ Twitter: https://twitter.com/orangepixel - game related
➡️ Twitter: https://twitter.com/orangepascal - everything else
➡️ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/orangepixel
➡️ IG: http://instagram.com/orangepixelgames
➡️ http://www.orangepixel.net
